el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=2 rooms_high=2
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-water", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "*" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) fill_floor("fl-ice", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c == "s" then set_item("it-spring1",i-1,line) fill_floor("fl-ice", i-1,line,1,1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="x" then fill_floor("fl-ice", i-1,line, 1,1) end end end
-- Floor: " " -- Border: "#" -- Oxyd: "o"
renderLine(00,"#######################################") renderLine(01,"# # # xx x #") renderLine(02,"# xxxxxx x xxx # o o*xxxxxxx #") renderLine(03,"# xzxsxx xxxxxx # xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx #") renderLine(04,"# xxxxxx xxxxxx # xxxxxxxx xx xx #") renderLine(05,"# xx # xxooooxx xx #") renderLine(06,"######## xxx # xxo oxx # x xx #") renderLine(07,"# x # xxo oxx # xxxx #") renderLine(08,"*xxxx # xxooooxx # xxxx #") renderLine(09,"*xx x xx # xxxxxxxx # #") renderLine(10,"*xx x xxx ## xxxxxxxx ## #") renderLine(11,"*x xxx ### # o o# xx #") renderLine(12,"*x x xxx ## ############# xx #") renderLine(13,"*x xxxx # xx x # xxx #") renderLine(14,"*xx # xxxxx xxxx xxx # xxxx #") renderLine(15,"* x # xxxxx xxxxxxx # xxx #") renderLine(16,"* # xxx x xxx # xx xx #") renderLine(17,"*xx # x xxx # #") renderLine(18,"*xxxx xxxxxx x x # xxxxxxx*") renderLine(19,"*xxxx xxx xxx # # xx x xx*") renderLine(20,"*x x xxxx # x x xxxxxxx*") renderLine(21,"*x xxx x xx # xxxxxx x xxxx *") renderLine(22,"# xxxxxxx xx # xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx*") renderLine(23,"# xxxx xxxxxx# xxxxxx #") renderLine(24,"#####****##******######################")
oxyd_shuffle()
